snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 417: Shadow Rising - Reinedgening - (SAGE2016 & RAGE2016)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Shadow Rising - Reinedgening - SAGE2016/RAGE2016
Credit: MrLevRocks
Release Date: October 15th, 2016

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.
RAGE2016: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wCYKWGtDBtI

00:00 - Boot&Title
00:32 - Cutscene
02:02 - Westopolis Zone 1
08:45 - G.U.N Base Zone 2
13:42 - Credits
15:35 - Original Westopolis Zone 1 (RAGE2016)

NOTES: Time to play some Contra!
I mean uh... Shatra? Shadowtra... Something something...
ANYWAY! So here we literally have a mix of "Metal Gear Rising – Revengence"
"Contra" and "Shadow the Hedgehog" in some kind of a fusion.
And for the most part I must say I love it, but at the same time it could use some polish.
The camera getting stuck and or under other scenarios perma stuck is not very good...
But overall the game plays and or feels like a Contra game just with Shadow.
Got most of the classic weapons and every ones favorite Spread Gun of course.
Story wise there is not much to speak of side from the first cutscene.
And sadly no Stage 2 boss.
Now the odd thing about this game is that the first Demo of this game appeared on "RAGE2016 Act 1" for... Some unknown reason.
And later this one appeared in SAGE2016, really unsure why that was the case as there is nothing "RAGE" about this game.
The RAGE level is basically the "Original Westopolis" level that comes after the Credits.
Overall tho this game is neat, would of been interesting to have more levels and the camera scrolling issues fixed.

(ISSUES)

1. The screen may get stuck and not scroll forward.
2. Game Over after Credits can lock you out of the Bonus Stage.

(SECRETS)

Enter the "Konami Code" during Title Screen.
